title.rendered: She Slams On the Brakes, Jumps Out, and Terrifies Everyone

content.rendered:
You have reached your final destination!

Posted by CarBuzz on Saturday, September 5, 2015

This video is not a glitch from a video game, someone actually did this. For no apparent reason, this Hyundai driver slams on the brakes and storms out of her vehicle in the middle of a busy 4-lane divided highway. If that wasn’t weird enough, she puts her bag on her shoulder and casually walks along the median as if she just left her house for a midday stroll. Meanwhile, her car, which is still in drive, crosses the median and causes havoc in oncoming traffic. Was she getting revenge on her cheating boyfriend by trashing his car, is she just plain nuts, or both?

title.rendered: Recreating Mad Max’s Original Interceptor Car

content.rendered: Dale Walter fell in love with Max’s post-apocalyptic, wasteland wandering Interceptor when he first watched George Miller’s masterpiece over 30 years ago. The same Interceptor has been featured in every Mad Max film since. Back in 2008, Dale hired the company Mad Max Cars to help convert his 1982 Australian Ford Falcon into Max’s iconic car. It took about $160,000 (in Australian dollars) and 5 years of work to turn it into the Interceptor mirror that has an incredible 450 HP and even has a police PA system!

title.rendered: College Student Drives Barbie Jeep to Class

content.rendered: Say you’re a college student and you lose your driver’s license because of a DUI charge. How do you get around campus to class? If you’re like this woman, then you start driving around in a Barbie Jeep. The trend has become so popular that now other students and roommates are following her lead!

content.rendered: Traffic in foreign countries can be a little crazy. In Ethiopia, the drivers are so used to their insanely convoluted daily commute that they can easily navigate these enormous intersections without any accidents!

title.rendered: Ford GT40 Strutting Its Stuff at Formula One Grand Prix

content.rendered: Here’s some footage from the Spa-Francorchamps Circuit at the Formula One Grand Prix in Belgium. We get to see the classic Ford GT40 getting set to wow the audience. Turn up your speakers for some incredible engine sounds as it fires up its V8 and wows everyone in attendance!

title.rendered: Don’t Take a GoPro Selfie Like This Guy

content.rendered: This guy was vogueing for the GoPro when he should have been driving! This jeep driver and his buddies were trekking out for some canoeing when he got a little distracted. He was adjusting his selfie stick while driving and smashed into the back of his friend’s truck, crushing the canoe. Looks like they won’t be getting any action shots on the water.

title.rendered: Absolutely Epic Truck Jump

content.rendered: It’s Labor Day weekend. You’re out in the woods with some friends and an old truck that’s ready to die. So what do you do? Obviously, you set it on fire, drive it off a cliff and into a lake while leaping out of the driver’s seat! This is so awesome that we’ll forgive the stuntman for plugging his nose on the way into the water.

title.rendered: Airbag Prank Fail

content.rendered: Everyone’s seen the airbag prank made famous from the movie Neighbors. You place an undeployed airbag under a seat cushion, or in this case a tire, then fix the switch to a power source. You get a willing friend to sit on it. When it launches, it sends them into the air a good 10 feet. Fun for everyone, right? Well not if you’re this guy who makes the mistake of landing right on his tailbone!

title.rendered: The World’s Most Pimped-out Golf Cart

content.rendered: This 6 person ATV has been worked, reworked, and modified to hold the title of the world’s most pimped out cart! It’s known simply as “Stuuuuuupid.” It’s decked in speakers and made to take the party with it! Just watch how quickly the crowed gathers as soon as the music starts up!

title.rendered: Man Makes Incredibly Accurate Chitty Chitty Bang Bang Replica

content.rendered: Meet Tony Garofalo, the self-described Mr. Chitty Chitty Bang Bang. This has been his favorite movie since he saw it premier in theaters at the age of 4. He’s even got Dick Van Dyke’s costume from the movie along with tons of other memorabilia. In 2010, he decided he needed the car to finish the collection. He built it himself out of a 1914 Overland and pieced together everything else where he could find it!

title.rendered: Makeshift Welder with Jumper Cables and Two Batteries

content.rendered:
Welding can be a pretty laborious task. Most people don’t keep their welding setup with them, say, out in the field when they might need to make an emergency weld. This guy has come up with a quick and easy solution!

Rather than carrying around a whole welder wherever you go you can actually set up a great welding solution with only a few batteries and some simple supplies!

title.rendered: Meteorite Falls Over Bangkok

content.rendered: Just recently, a massive meteorite came crashing down over Bangkok during the middle of the day. Most drivers rely on dashcams to combat insurance scammers. Lucky for us, they caught footage of this meteor exploding atmosphere over the city!

title.rendered: 5 Pre-War Beauties Uncovered in Amazing Barn Find

content.rendered: Motostalgia Auctions founder Antonio Burnet is here to walk us through this incredible find containing five pre-war automobiles and a travel trailer. These treasures were locked away for more than 40 years. You will see a 1932 Cadillac V-12 Vic Convertible, 1933 Cadillac V-12 Town Coupe, 1938 Cadillac Series 90 Fleetwood Limousine, 1923 Milburn Electric Model 27L and a 1908 REO Model G Boattail Roadster/Sedan Tonneau!

title.rendered: Tractor Rescues Stranded Bentley

content.rendered: The Russian owner of this Bentley decided that taking it for a drive on a beach was a good idea. The Bentley, not known for its off-roading capabilities, got stuck…go figure. The tractor helped move it along and eventually had it freed even after snapping the car’s towing eye.

title.rendered: This ’68 Pro Street Charger Demands Your Attention

content.rendered: Try not to pity the other cars on the street as this Charger carves a path through them. This ’68 Charger is one of the most sought after and beloved muscle cars within the entire stable of American muscle. The throaty roar on display here is simply glorious!

title.rendered: Distracted Driver Kills a Toyota

content.rendered: You’re driving along, minding your own business, when someone runs a red light. It’s the type of horror scenario that runs through all our heads as we drive through intersections!

title.rendered: World’s Worst Tow Truck Driver

content.rendered:
Maybe it’s his first day on the job…likely also his last.

He can barely load the car on the flatbed as it is but as he’s trying to secure the load he must have forgotten to leave the truck in park is it rolls forward with the car only halfway loaded!

title.rendered: 1,600 HP Mustang with Insane Paint Job to Match

content.rendered: Not only is this Mustang one hell of a custom ride, but it’s got a wicked paint job to match! It’s sporting a 1,600 HP engine that’s capable of some incredible launches off the line as well as burnouts. We also love the personal touches like the exhaust spray jets shooting out from the top of the hood.

title.rendered: Don’t Shoot the Bird to Truck Drivers

content.rendered: This Audi got a little too aggressive and picked a fight with the wrong truck. The Audi driver is annoyed because it’s stuck behind the truck. Once he manages to get in front, he starts brake checking. The truck lays on the horn for and the driver fires off the middle finger. Bad move Audi.
